title: How to initialize an array of surface objects in RhinoPython?

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
center=(0,0,0)
radius=1
j=0
ids = []
while j<4:

   surfId = rs.AddSphere(center,radius+j)
   if surfId: ids.append(surfId)
   j += 1
code_blocks.author: pascal

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
center=(0,0,0)
radius=1

ids = [rs.AddSphere(center,radius+j) for j in range(4)]
code_blocks.author: pascal
Rhino_Gandalf
